ComicInfo.Summary: Something has escaped Stockgen labs and is hunting the Turtles. Its unrelenting and deadly force compel the Turtles to question how far they'll go to defend themselves... and stretch the brothers' bonds to the limit!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-27 13:02:19. [Issue ID 364147]

ComicInfo.Teams: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles,New York Police Department,Rock Soldiers
ComicInfo.Locations: New York State,Stock Gen Laboratories,Church Lair,New York City,Second Time Around
